details: Created a bundled changelog data file and modal so players can review product updates from the account bar.

Refined the new account menu into a compact, file-menu inspired widget with role badges, uppercase player names, and a slim character/chronicle/location strip while keeping the changelog button separate.
Hardened the Lambda handlers so API Gateway requests without the HTTP v2 metadata stop crashing, which restores the listCharacters and listChronicles player flows.
Collapsed the recent CSS refactors, player menu polish, character panel updates, and template shortcut tweaks into a single styling refresh that keeps the UI consistent.

summary: Added the moderator LLM audit review workspace
details: Moderators and admins can open the new LLM audit review page from the player menu to filter archived LLM requests, capture structured review notes, and inspect template improvement proposals.
